text: Kyle Kuzma Brutally Trolls Pistons After Cade Cunningham Sends Celtics Into Panic Mode [](https://bit.ly/4113QfS) Follow Us Coming into tonight‚Äôs game, the pressure is on for the Boston Celtics. While the Detroit Pistons are frustrated with their 27-game losing streak, the Celtics are looking to be ‚Äúnot that team‚Äù. But the Wizards‚Äô Kyle Kuzma seems to be quite adept at keeping Boston sharp. America‚Äôs Favorite Video Today Kuzma took to X (formerly Twitter), to share his thoughts on the progress of the game. Except that his thoughts are borderline trolling. He reposted a snap of the Celtics-Pistons score by the end of the first half, with the comment, ‚ÄúAt this point its like ‚Äúdont be that team‚Äù,‚Äù with a laughing emoji at the end.
